title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4900.4 - Records available
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4900.4 - Records available

State Regulations
(a) In
accord with the rules in this section, the authority and its subsidiaries shall
make available for public inspection and copying all records except those
exempted from disclosure by section
4900.6
of this Part. (b) In addition, the authority and its
subsidiaries shall maintain: (1)
a record of
the final vote of each member of the authority or its subsidiaries in every
proceeding in which he or she votes; (2)
a record setting forth the name, public
office address, title and salary of every officer or employee of the authority
and its subsidiaries; and
(3)
a
reasonably detailed current list, by subject matter, of all records in the
possession of the authority and its subsidiaries, whether or not available
under subdivisions 2 and 3 of section 87 of the Freedom of Information Law. This list will be updated at least semiannually, and will show the date of the
most recent update on the first page. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4900.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
